about_the_game:
A World-Saving Magical Girl Rhythm Adventure Game！
With the power of the bond between heroine and hero, step through the gate to the world of dreams.

These is the special chapters of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team", their first completely new game in ten years!

Please make sure to play through to chapter12 before purchasing.

  • Ayumu Chapter 10: Attack of the Moon Rose
  • Ayumu Chapter 11: Birdcage of Darkness
  • Ayumu Chapter 12: A Friend
  • Suzune Chapter 10 The Two Traps
  • Suzune Chapter 11: Suzune Rescue Operation
  • Suzune Chapter 12 The Brilliance of Meteor
  • Chapter SP Triangle Date

SP Chapter


It's a hot summer day. Asami gets two pool tickets at a shopping mall.
Kirara tries to go to the pool with Kaneto without telling anyone, but Suzune finds out when she tells Yumemi.
However, when Suzune tells Yumemi, it is revealed that Suzune is the one who told Yumemi.
And then Ayumi joins the frayーー!

Ayumi's Route


The appearance of the Muma has calmed down, and Dreamer is enjoying a brief period of peace.
Kanato and Ayumi head to the school pool to train for swimming, but they receive a report from Tsukina that the swim team teacher has collapsed and lost consciousness.
They hurry to get there, but find that Muma has already gone inside the teacher.
To buy time, Kanato and Ayumi head for the dream world.
However, what awaited them there were Gridor and Belpheus.
Although they were able to meet up with Yumemi and the others, Dreamer was gradually cornered by the two Nightmare Origins.
The one who saved Ayumi and the others was a mysterious warrior wearing a mask.
The warrior, who called himself Moon Rose, defeated Belpheus and the others with overwhelming power, and then attacked Dreamer.
Is the mysterious warrior an enemy, or...? ....

Suzune's Route


Despite defeating Envy Rose, Muma's attacks continue unabated, and Suzune, the youngest and least experienced Dreamer, continues to lose.
Thanks to the efforts of Yumemi and the others, they manage to fight off the Mumas, but Suzune is still depressed.
Finally, she and Meteo run away from home.
Then, Muma attacks the town again.
Overcoming Meteo's restraint, Suzune goes into the dream world alone.
She tries to ask Kanato and the others for help, but the golem blocks her way.
On the other hand, Yumemi and the others, sensing Muma's attack, head for the dream world of the unconscious inhabitants, but what awaits them?

content_descriptors.notes: Visual Novel with mature theme, some nudity and sexual content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Environment capable of 1280 x 720, full-color display
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: These is the special chapters of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team", their first completely new game in ten years!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
